attributes.action: pass legislation that will permanently remove from the House of Lords those who have been found to be corrupt
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If members of The House of Lords are found to have acted in an improper way and used their position to influence legislation in an improper way, then they should have their titles removed and they should be no longer allowed to sit in either the Lords, Commons or hold any political or public office in the future.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
